replies.body:
I enjoyed the video,
Just some things to improve on:
- It would be good to sync the gameplay/clips to the song
- Where the drops are I think you could add some good PvP there
- Song choice was great
- At the end you say 'Thanks for watching' then it says it again. No need to reinforce just need it once.

Just some helpful advice to think about when making things like this
I really like the idea (as I've said before) this is something me personally I would watch
